original: @325a dkon @325b mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @325a dkon @325b mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: sy'ad ya the dan /🔽kha te kha te /🔽kha ta bi kha te /
analyzed: sy'ad ya the dan / kha te kha te / kha ta bi kha te /
translated: Sya dya the dhan.🔽Khe te khe te.🔽Khe ta bi khe te.

original: bi lam bi ba le ba la pa te /
analyzed: bi lam bi ba le ba la pa te /
translated: Vi lam bi ba le ba la pa te.

original: aa mri ta ni ra gho she /
analyzed: aa mri ta ni ra gho she /

original: rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa zhi bar gyur cig sv'ah'a /
analyzed: rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa zhi bar gyur cig sv'ah'a /
translated: May the wind, bile, phlegm, and their combinations be pacified. Svāhā.

original: nad pa'i sman la gdab bo //
analyzed: nad pa'i sman la gdab bo //
translated: This is to be applied to the medicine of the sick person.

original: stong chen mo nas phyung ba sman la sngags kyi gdab pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: stong chen mo nas phyung ba sman la sngags kyi gdab pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The mantra application to medicine extracted from the Great Thousand is complete.
